issue.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://fantasy.espn.com/football/league/scoreboard?leagueId=73604802](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Ffantasy.espn.com%2Ffootball%2Fleague%2Fscoreboard%3FleagueId%3D73604802) ### Comment > In the ESPN fantasy Scoreboard page the Matchup and Box Score buttons are missing with filtering enabled. Filters: | Ad Blocking:
AdGuard Base,
AdGuard Mobile Ads

Privacy:
AdGuard Tracking Protection

comment.body:
I don't run Adguard on my desktop so I can't verify. I did verify the
buttons display properly in Safari with Adguard protection disabled and
when I enable it again the buttons are filtered. Can you recommend a
debugging approach I can use to identify the specific filter. I have both
Safari protection and Advanced protection enabled. I don't think the DNS
protection is causing it. I can disable that and still observe the
behavior. I have the base filter and mobile ads filter enabled on the base
group and the tracking filter protection enabled. That's it plus the
advanced filtering.

On Fri, Jan 5, 2024 at 2:31 PM Sergey ***@***.***> wrote:

> Hello @ukchucktown <https://github.com/ukchucktown>
> Unfortunately, I can't open this page to check it out. Which filter causes
> the issue? Does the problem reproduce on the desktop computer?
> 132.png (view on web)
> <https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/assets/18536328/2b22a088-6281-4295-b577-610a16a24726>
>
> —
> Reply to this email directly, view it on GitHub
> <https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/169731#issuecomment-1879163945>,
> or unsubscribe
> <https://github.com/notifications/unsubscribe-auth/AAE44RFT24KPJQII2VZNEC3YNBIINAVCNFSM6AAAAABBJGH7D2VHI2DSMVQWIX3LMV43OSLTON2WKQ3PNVWWK3TUHMYTQNZZGE3DGOJUGU>
> .
> You are receiving this because you were mentioned.Message ID:
> ***@***.***>
>
